A

addOrderItem(int, int, String, int, double) - Static method in class Controller.OrderController
Adds an order item into an Order in the ArrayList of Orders.
addOrderItem(String, String, int, double) - Method in class Class.Order
Adds an item into this Order using the name of the menu item, remarks, quantity and price.
addReservation(Reservation) - Static method in class Controller.ReservationController
add an object of Reservation into the reservationList
adjustDiscountPrice(double) - Static method in class Controller.PaymentController
This method allows the staff to set the percentage of discount the hotel wants to implement.
adjustRoomPrice(double, double, String) - Static method in class Controller.PaymentController
Sets the prices of a particular room type on weekday and on weekend.
adjustTaxRate(double) - Static method in class Controller.PaymentController
This method allows the staff to set the percentage of tax the hotel wants to implement.
autoRoomBill() - Method in class Class.Reservation
call the function calRoomBill() to calculate the room bill of this Reservation
then update the new room bill to this Reservation.
autoToExpired() - Static method in class Controller.ReservationController
Changes the reservation status of each reservation in reservationList to EXPIRED if the check-in date has passed, that is after 4pm on the check-in date
autoUpdateReservationDetails(Room) - Static method in class Controller.ReservationController
Assign the room given, to a reservation in WAITLIST which this Reservation's room has the same room type as room given, and also the earliest check-in date
